overview: Ana and Damon have worked together plenty in the past, but always in demanding, precarious scenarios. They've never had the chance to freely enjoy each other the way they'd like. Their connection as real-life besties is apparent even before they get into the room together. So when Ana's buoyant, radiant energy and Damon's laid-back lover vibes come together on that comfy bed for the first time, the result is nothing short of the Bellesa House gold standard: super wholesome, sexy af, and downright magical.
title: Sexual Desires 2
